trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The amphisbaena has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The amphisbaena makes two bite attacks.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})穿刺傷害， and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The croaker can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
entries: The croaker can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The croaker's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: The croaker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害， or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Glaaar-pat (3/Day)
entries: The croaker sings a song of marshy doom. Each chosen creature within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw also has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Rooooo-glog (1/Day)
entries: The croaker sings an ode to an elder froghemoth. Each bullywug within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song gains 10 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The royal can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the royal hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Frog Rider
entries: The royal has advantage on melee attacks made while riding a frog mount.

trait.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
entries: The royal can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The royal's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: The royal has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The royal makes two attacks: one with its royal spear and one with its bite.

action.name: Royal Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})穿刺傷害， or 12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Croaked Decree (1/Day)
entries: The royal makes a loud pronouncement. Each bullywug within 60 feet of the royal that can hear the pronouncement has advantage on its next attack roll.

monster.name: Drowned Ascetic
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Bottom Treader
entries: The drowned ascetic cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

trait.name: Bound Together
entries: The drowned ascetic shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the drowned ascetic to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned ascetic drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The drowned ascetic makes three unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or contract {@disease bluerot|GoS} (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

reaction.name: Dexterous Target
entries: The drowned ascetic adds 3 to its AC against one ranged attack that would hit it. To do so, the drowned ascetic must see the attacker.

monster.name: Drowned Assassin
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Bottom Treader
entries: The drowned assassin cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

trait.name: Bound Together
entries: The drowned assassin shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the drowned assassin to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned assassin drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The drowned assassin makes two hand crossbow attacks or two dagger attacks. It can then take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or contract {@disease bluerot|GoS} (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or contract {@disease bluerot|GoS} (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

action.name: Reveal (1/Day)
entries: The drowned assassin removes its mask, revealing its rotting face. Each creature of the assassin's choice within 30 feet of it that can see the assassin must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

monster.name: Drowned Blade
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Bottom Treader
entries: The drowned blade cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

trait.name: Bound Together
entries: The drowned blade shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the drowned blade to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned blade drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The drowned blade makes two rusted longsword attacks.

action.name: Rusted Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or contract {@disease bluerot|GoS} (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

monster.name: Drowned Master
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Bound Together
entries: The drowned master shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

trait.name: Cold Aura
entries: At the start of each of the drowned master's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage. A creature that touches the drowned master or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the drowned master to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned master drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The drowned master makes two attacks: one with its greatsword and one with its Life-Draining Tentacle.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or contract {@disease bluerot|GoS} (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

action.name: Life-Draining Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. On a failed save, the target also contracts bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

action.name: Necrotic Ink {@recharge 5}
entries: The drowned master discharges foul ink in front of itself in a 30-foot cone. Each creature caught in the ink must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn and contracts bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3})穿刺傷害， and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a failed save, the target begins to hallucinate and is afflicted with a {@table short-term madness|DMG} effect (determined randomly or by the DM; see "Madness" in chapter 8 of the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness}). The effect lasts 10 minutes.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The eel can breathe only underwater.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2})穿刺傷害。

items.name: Water Breathing
entries: The eel can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: 誘惑大師
entries: 當距離在60尺及以內時，生物對女族長的誘惑之歌Luring Song豁免檢定具有劣勢。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 鳥妖女族長在抵抗法術及其它魔法效應時進行的豁免檢定具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 女族長發動兩次爪抓。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 轉瞬化形
entries: 女族長可以魔法地將自身偽裝成為一個與類人生物差不多體型及外表的模樣，該形態最多可以持續一個小時。它可以用一個附贈動作恢復到它的真實形態。這種幻象經不住近距離的仔細觀察。

action.name: 誘惑之歌
entries: 女族長唱出一段魔法的樂章。其周邊300尺範圍內所有能夠聽到它歌聲的類人生物和巨人必須進行一次{@dc 14} 的感知豁免，豁免失敗者將被女族長{@condition 魅惑}至歌聲終止。該女族長必須在隨後每個其自己的回合中使用一個附贈動作來維持演唱。而她也可以隨時停止演唱。女族長失能時，歌聲也隨之終止。

被女族長{@condition 魅惑}後，該目標將陷入失能並無視其他鳥妖的歌聲。如果被魅惑目標距離該女族長超過5尺，則該目標必須在其自己回合裡並以最短路徑向靠近該女族長的方向移動。目標此時無法避開借機攻擊，但在進入危險地形前（比如熔岩或陷坑），以及受到除該女族長外的任何來源所造成的傷害時，其可以再進行一次該豁免。該生物也可以在每個其自己回合結束時再進行一次該豁免。如果該生物的豁免成功，則終止其身上的該效應。
豁免成功的目標將在隨後的24小時裡免疫女族長的歌聲。

action.name: 欲望之容 (1/日)
entries: 女族長向距離它30尺以內的非構裝體或不死生物的生物心靈中投射一種幻象，向每一個生物展示它最渴望的東西。受影響的生物必須成功通過一次{@dc 14}的感知豁免，否則將會丟下手中的任何物品，並陷入{@condition 麻痹}持續直至其下一回合結束。

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kraken can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The kraken makes two tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with a use of Fling.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 12}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7})穿刺傷害 If the target is a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken, that creature is swallowed and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the kraken's turns. One Medium or two smaller creatures can be swallowed at the same time.

If the kraken takes 35 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in spaces within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 12} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Medium or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lightning Strike
entries: The kraken magically create a bolt of lightning, which can strike a target the kraken can see within 90 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kraken makes one tentacle attack.

legendary.name: Fling
entries: The kraken uses Fling.

legendary.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 40-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The koalinth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the koalinth can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the koalinth that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 3}，射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害， or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The koalinth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the sergeant can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the sergeant that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The sergeant makes two melee attacks with its trident.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害， or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Hooked Net
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4} to hit, range 10/30 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害， and the target is {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 12} Strength check to free itself or another creature in a hooked net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

reaction.name: Spear the Helpless (2/Day)
entries: Whenever a creature within 30 feet of the sergeant becomes {@condition restrained}, the sergeant can move its speed toward the {@condition restrained} creature. If the sergeant ends its move within reach of the {@condition restrained} creature, it can make a melee attack against it.

spellcasting.name: 天生施法
headerEntries: 基什的施法關鍵屬性為魅力（法術豁免{@dc 12}，法術攻擊命中{@hit 4}）。他可以施展下列法術且僅需要言語成分。

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 基什可以在空氣或水中呼吸。

trait.name: 海之使者
entries: 基什可以與能在水中呼吸的野獸簡單溝通交流。它們能夠理解它的話的意思，雖然它沒有特殊的能力來明白這些野獸的回應。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 基什使用他的矛進行兩次近戰武器攻擊。

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。 或射程20/60呎，單一目標。 {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害，或使用雙手發動近戰攻擊時 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) 穿刺傷害。

monster.name: 活化鋼鐵像
languages: 理解創造者所會的語言, 但不會說

trait.name: 不變形態
entries: 魔像免疫於任何會改變它形態的法術或效果。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 塑像發動兩次攻擊：一次使用劍劈，一次使用錘

action.name: 劍劈
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 戰錘
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})的鈍擊傷害，同時目標應擊 {@condition 伏地}.

action.name: 旋風斬 {@recharge 5}
entries: 雕像可以使用其動作從腰部開始高速旋轉，選擇其10尺內的複數生物。每個生物必須進行一次{@dc 13}的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗者受到19（{@damage 3d10 + 3}）點鈍擊傷害並倒地，豁免成功則傷害減半。

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 血腥狂怒
entries: 撕裂者對任何生命值沒有全滿的生物所進行的近戰攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The render can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The render makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its bite.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Rend the Field {@recharge 5}
entries: The render makes a claw attack against each creature of its choice within 10 feet of it. A creature hit by this attack must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: 屏息
entries: 蜥蜴人可以憋氣 15 分鐘。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 鱗盾武士發動兩次近戰攻擊，每次使用不同的武器。

action.name: 釘頭錘
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 刺盾
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

reaction.name: 盾牌格檔
entries: 如果一個在鱗盾武士五尺內的盟友被一次攻擊命中，鱗盾武士能夠將這次攻擊的傷害減半。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The subchief is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, 命中{@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The subchief can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Tooth Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Jaws of Semuanya {@recharge 5}
entries: The subchief invokes the primal magic of Semuanya, summoning a spectral maw around a target it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is also {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Leviathan Will
entries: The locathah has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition poisoned}, {@condition stunned}, or put to sleep.

trait.name: 有限兩棲
entries: 洛卡魚人可以在空氣和水中呼吸，但它每4小時必須至少回到水中一次以避免窒息。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The locathah makes two melee attacks with its spear.

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 3}，射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})穿刺傷害， or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage if used with two hands.

trait.name: 利維坦意志
entries: 獵手在對抗控制類法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 有限兩棲
entries: 獵手可以在空氣與水中呼吸，但至少每4小時要回到水裡，以避免窒息。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 獵手使用他的毒弩進行兩次遠端武器攻擊。

action.name: 毒弩
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程80/320呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。目標需通過一次{@dc 12}的體質豁免，否則陷入中毒狀態直至其下回合結束。

action.name: 短棒
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})鈍擊傷害

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (2/日)
entries: 瑟寇拉之喉豁免失敗時，可以將其改為豁免成功。

trait.name: 水下呼吸
entries: 瑟寇拉之喉只能在水下呼吸。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 。瑟寇拉之喉發動兩次攻擊：一次啃咬攻擊和一次粉碎尾擊攻擊。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 粉碎尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5})鈍擊傷害。

legendary.name: 偵查
entries: 瑟寇拉之喉進行一次感知（察覺）檢定。

legendary.name: 瑟寇拉之迅捷
entries: 瑟寇拉之喉移動最多等於其速度的的距離。

legendary.name: 饕餮 （消耗2 動作）
entries: 瑟寇拉兇狠的精魂從水中閃過，撕裂瑟寇拉之喉的敵人。瑟寇拉之喉選擇的60尺內的生物，它們必須進行一次{@dc 16}的敏捷豁免，豁免失敗則受到7（{@damage 2d6}）傷害，成功則傷害減半。

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: 人魚可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 人魚使用他的珊瑚刺劍進行兩次近戰武器攻擊。

action.name: 珊瑚刺劍
entries: {@atk m} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 注入毒素（2/日）
entries: {@atk m} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。受到此傷害的生物須成功通過一次{@dc 12}的體質豁免，否則陷入麻痹直至其下一回合結束。

monster.name: 水晶活化魔像米諾陶
languages: 理解創造者所會的語言, 但不會說

trait.name: 不變形態
entries: 魔像免疫於任何會改變它形態的法術或效果。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 魔像進行二次攻擊：一次巨斧，一次角撞。

action.name: 巨斧
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 角撞
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})穿刺傷害。

reaction.name: 飛屑
entries: 當一個生物以一次近戰武器攻擊命中塑像時，魔像對攻擊者造成11（2d10）的穿刺傷害。

monster.name: 龐巨鹿鷹獸
languages: 理解通用語和精靈與但不會說

trait.name: 飛掠
entries: 鹿鷹獸飛出敵人觸及範圍時不會觸發借機攻擊。

trait.name: 敏銳視嗅覺
entries: 鹿鷹獸依賴視覺和嗅覺進行的感知（察覺）檢定具有優勢。

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: 鹿鷹獸豁免失敗時，可以將其改為豁免成功。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The peryton makes two attacks: one with its gore and one with its talons.

action.name: 頂撞
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 禽爪
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 扭曲陰影
entries: 鹿鷹獸選擇距離它60尺以內它所能看到的的三個生物。每個生物必須在一次{@dc 14}的感知豁免中成功，否則將受到詛咒。當被詛咒時，每當該生物進行攻擊骰、技能檢定或豁免擲骰時，它必須擲出一個{@dice d4}，並從骰值中減去該次d4的結果。被詛咒的生物可以在自己的每回合結束時重複這項豁免，成功則結束對自身的效果。一個豁免成功的生物將在接下來的24小時內免疫該鹿鷹獸的扭曲陰影。

legendary.name: 偵查
entries: 鹿鷹獸進行一次睿智（感知）檢定。

legendary.name: 禽爪攻擊
entries: 鹿鷹獸進行一次禽爪攻擊。

legendary.name: 俯衝攻擊 (消耗2動作)
entries: 鹿鷹獸向它所選擇的單一目標加速前進，然後進行一次頂撞攻擊，若命中則額外造成9（{@damage 2d8}）的穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Mr. Dory's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (save {@dc 15}, 命中{@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Mr. Dory can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Mr. Dory has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Water Dependency
entries: Mr. Dory takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage at the end of every hour he goes without exposure to water.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: Mr. Dory makes three attacks with his rapier.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Eye of Corruption {@recharge 5}
entries: Mr. Dory glares at a creature he can see within 30 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) necrotic damage and 27 ({@damage 5d10}) poison damage and then gains vulnerability to both necrotic and poison damage for 1 minute. On a successful save, it takes half damage and does not gain the vulnerabilities.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Oceanus can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Friend of the Sea
entries: Using gestures and sounds, Oceanus can communicate simple ideas with any beast that has an innate swimming speed.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害， or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: Cargo Hauler
entries: The bosun has advantage on Strength checks.

trait.name: Sea Legs
entries: The bosun has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Light Hammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 5}，射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺傷害， and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}).

trait.name: Flourish
entries: The captain adds its Charisma modifier to the damage roll for its longsword attacks (included in the attack).

trait.name: Sea Legs
entries: The captain has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The captain makes two attacks: one with its hand crossbow and one with its longsword.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

reaction.name: Shape Up, Ye Dog (2/Day)
entries: Whenever a friendly creature within 30 feet of the captain that can hear it misses with an attack, the captain can yell perilous threats to allow that creature to reroll the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The deck wizard is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, 命中{@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Sea Legs
entries: The deck wizard has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d6})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: Sea Legs
entries: The first mate has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The first mate makes two attacks with its longsword.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands. If the target is a creature, the first mate can choose to deal no damage with the attack to disarm the target. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding on the ground.

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, 命中{@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: 血腥狂怒
entries: 大劍師對任何生命值沒有全滿的生物所進行的近戰攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 有限兩棲
entries: 大劍師可以在空氣與水中呼吸，但至少每4小時要回到水裡，以避免窒息。

trait.name: 鯊心感應
entries: 藉由有限的心靈感應，大劍師可以用魔法對任何距離它120呎內的鯊魚下達命令。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 大劍師以破浪劍進行三次攻擊，或者一次啃咬和兩次爪擊。

action.name: Wavecutter Blade
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 血腥狂怒
entries: 勇士對任何生命值沒有全滿的生物所進行的近戰攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 有限兩棲
entries: 沙華魚人可以在空氣和水中呼吸，但它每4小時必須至少回到水中一次以避免窒息。

trait.name: 鯊心感應
entries: 藉由有限的心靈感應，沙華魚人可以用魔法對任何距離它120呎內的鯊魚下達命令。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 勇士以矛進行三次攻擊，或者一次啃咬和兩次爪抓。

action.name: 矛
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 5}，射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害，或若雙手使用以進行一次近戰攻擊時則造成 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) 穿刺傷害。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 血腥狂怒
entries: 珊瑚粉碎者對任何生命值沒有全滿的生物所進行的近戰攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 有限兩棲
entries: 珊瑚粉碎者可以在空氣和水中呼吸，但它每4小時必須至少回到水中一次以避免窒息。

trait.name: 鯊心感應
entries: 藉由有限的心靈感應，沙華魚人可以用魔法對任何距離它120呎內的鯊魚下達命令。

trait.name: 攻城怪物
entries: 珊瑚粉碎者對物件和建築物造成雙倍傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 珊瑚粉碎者進行兩次戰錘攻擊，或者一次啃咬和一次爪擊。

action.name: 戰錘
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})劈砍傷害。

trait.name: 血腥狂怒
entries: 深潛者對任何生命值沒有全滿的生物所進行的近戰攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 鹽水潛伏者
entries: 深潛者在潛入水中時的敏捷（隱匿）檢定上具有優勢。

trait.name: 有限兩棲
entries: 深潛者可以在空氣和水中呼吸，但它每4小時必須至少回到水中一次以避免窒息。

trait.name: 引誘
entries: 深潛者可以隨意使它的誘餌變亮或變暗。當誘餌被點亮時，深潛者在以自身為中心的30尺半徑內發出明亮光照，而在額外20尺範圍內發出微光光照。

trait.name: 鯊心感應
entries: 藉由有限的心靈感應，深潛者可以用魔法對任何距離它120呎內的鯊魚下達命令。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 深潛者進行兩次大砍刀攻擊，或者一次啃咬和一次爪抓。

action.name: 大砍刀
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 瑟寇拉之光
entries: 深潛者使誘餌散發出魔法的光芒。任何離深潛者30尺以內的生物，只要能看見光，就必須成功通過一次{@dc 11}的感知豁免，否則將被{@condition 魅惑}直到該生物的下一個回合結束。以這種方式被魅惑的生物在凝視光的時候處於{@condition 無力}的狀態。

trait.name: 血腥狂怒
entries: 幼體集群對任何生命值沒有全滿的生物所進行的近戰攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 沸騰
entries: 一旦它進入戰鬥，如果它於該回合沒有發動攻擊，則在回合結束時對自己造成10點揮砍傷害。此傷害無視抗性，並且不能將集群的生命值降至0。

trait.name: 集群
entries: 集群可以佔據另一個生物所在的空間，反之亦然。且集群可以穿過任何足以讓一隻微型昆蟲通過的開口。集群無法回復生命值或獲得臨時生命值。

trait.name: 水下呼吸
entries: 集群只能在水下呼吸。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及0呎，單一處於集群所在位置的生物。{@h}14 ({@damage 4d6})穿刺傷害，或者集群生命值等於或低於一半時7 ({@damage 2d6})的穿刺傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: 高階女祭司作為7級施法者，其施法關鍵屬性為感知（法術豁免{@dc 14}，法術攻擊命中{@hit 6}）。她準備了以下牧師法術：

trait.name: 血腥狂怒
entries: 高階女祭司對任何生命值沒有全滿的生物所進行的近戰攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 有限兩棲
entries: 高階女祭司可以在空氣和水中呼吸，但它每4小時必須至少回到水中一次以避免窒息。

trait.name: 鯊心感應
entries: 藉由有限的心靈感應，高階女祭司可以用魔法對任何距離它120呎內的鯊魚下達命令。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 高階女祭司進行兩次多牙法杖攻擊，或者一次啃咬和一次爪擊。

action.name: 多牙法杖
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})劈砍傷害。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: 塑濤者天生施法的關鍵屬性為智力（法術豁免{@dc 14}，法術攻擊命中{@hit 6}）。塑濤者天生可施展如下法術，且無需任何相應的材料成分：

trait.name: 血腥狂怒
entries: 塑濤者對任何生命值沒有全滿的生物所進行的近戰攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 有限兩棲
entries: 塑濤者可以在空氣和水中呼吸，但它每4小時必須至少回到水中一次以避免窒息。

trait.name: 鯊心感應
entries: 藉由有限的心靈感應，塑濤者可以用魔法對任何距離它120呎內的鯊魚下達命令。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 塑濤者進行兩次攻擊，一次啃咬和一次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1})穿刺傷害加上13 ({@damage 3d8})寒冰傷害。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1})穿刺傷害加上1 ({@damage 3d8})寒冰傷害。

action.name: 渦流 (1/日)
entries: 塑濤者以一個至少50平方尺和25尺深的水體為目標，並在該區域的中心形成一個漩渦。漩渦的底部為一個5尺寬的漩渦，在頂部可達50尺寬，25尺高，該效應持續1分鐘或直到塑濤者失能為止。任何在水中的生物或物體，在距離漩渦的25尺內，都會被向內拉近10尺。一名生物可以進行一次{@dc 14}力量（運動）的檢定，成功則遊離漩渦。
當一個生物第一次進入渦旋或在渦旋內部開始其回合時，它必須進行一次DC 14的力量豁免。豁免失敗者受到9 （{@damage 2d8}）的鈍擊傷害，並被困在漩渦之中直到其回合結束。豁免成功則傷害減半，並且不會被捲入漩渦中。被漩渦困住的生物可以用它的動作試圖遊出漩渦，但是它在力量（運動）的檢定上具有劣勢。
當一個物體第一次進入漩渦時，它會受到9 ({@damage 2d8})的鈍擊傷害。該物體在漩渦內的每一輪都會受到該種傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: Sanbalet is a 3rd-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, 命中{@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 3}，射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 血腥狂怒
entries: 殼中鯊對任何生命值沒有全滿的生物所進行的近戰攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The shark has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The shark makes two bite attacks.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2})穿刺傷害。

monster.name: Skeletal Alchemist
languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The skeletal alchemist has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The skeletal alchemist makes two Lob Acid attacks.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Lob Acid
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 3} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) acid damage.

trait.name: Disassemble
entries: If the juggernaut is reduced to 0 hit points, twelve skeletons rise from its remains.

trait.name: Falling Apart
entries: If the juggernaut does not have all of its hit points at the start of its turn, it loses 10 hit points.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The juggernaut makes two claws attacks.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Avalanche of Bones {@recharge 5}
entries: The juggernaut collapses into a large heap before quickly reforming. Each creature within 10 feet of the juggernaut must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is also knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Deafening Clatter
entries: Creatures are {@condition deafened} while in the swarm's space.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Small humanoid. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Slash
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Abolethic Vassal
entries: The skum is permanently {@condition charmed} by its aboleth master.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The skum can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Psychic Conditioning
entries: The skum is immune to the {@condition frightened} and {@condition charmed} conditions unless they are from effects created by an aboleth.

trait.name: Water Dependency
entries: The skum takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes it goes without exposure to water.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The skum makes three attacks: two with its trident and one with its Mind-Breaking Touch.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Mind-Breaking Touch
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage, and the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws until the end of the skum's next turn.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: Thousand Teeth can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If Thousand Teeth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: Thousand Teeth makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})鈍擊傷害。 If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Thousand Teeth makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Lunge
entries: Thousand Teeth moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Thousand Teeth makes a bite attack.

monster.name: 吸血鬼玉雕
languages: 理解創造者所會的語言, 但不會說

trait.name: 不變形態
entries: 魔像免疫於任何會改變它形態的法術或效果。

trait.name: 傳奇抗性 (3/日)
entries: 若魔像在一次豁免檢定中失敗，它可以選擇改為使其成功。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 魔像進行三次攻擊：一次啃咬，二次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})的穿刺傷害。如果目標是一個生物，該生物被雕像所詛咒。詛咒持續十分鐘。當生物被詛咒時，雕像對其進行的攻擊檢定具有優勢。

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

legendary.name: 啃咬
entries: 雕像進行一次啃咬攻擊。

legendary.name: 血腥收割
entries: 所有目前處於雕像20呎內並被雕像詛咒的生物受到5點黯蝕傷害。

legendary.name: 移動
entries: 雕像移動至多等於其自身速度的距離，且不會因此引發借機攻擊。
